alert.note: Alert for Morris; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 6:08AM EST until January 09 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain is expected. Total ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The Pennsylvania counties of Berks, Lehigh and Northampton. The New Jersey counties of Warren and Morris. * WHEN...Until 3:00 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are expected. Untreated roads and walkways will become ice covered and slippery.
info.instruction: Reschedule travel if you can. Also, if you must drive, slow down and use extra caution. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
